Key Match Events: Boston Red Sox scored 4 runs in the first inning
Tyler O'Neill hit a two-run home run in the third inning
Andrew Benintendi hit a three-run home run in the seventh inning
Pre-Game Insights: White Sox starter Garrett Crochet had a tough outing
Red Sox had a good game plan and made Crochet work in the first inning
Post-Match Reflections: White Sox interim manager Grady Sizemore said the team had some opportunities where they didn't score runs
Sizemore said the team needs to play better to keep themselves in games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox lost their 111th game of the season and 19th straight series
The team is nine shy of matching the 1962 New York Mets for the most losses in modern-day history
